attributes.action: change the law to stop gardens being designated as brownfield sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present gardens are classified as brownfield sites. This allows developers to bypass many planning rules and build on garden plots, so increasing the density of housing. Many lovely gardens are being destroyed by this practice. How can a garden be classed as brownfield development?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change the law to stop gardens being designated as brownfield sites."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14457.asp

Prime Minister's Office
